name: E.Y. B.
text: Terrible. Terrible. Horrible. No good, very bad place. DISCLAIMER: I don't need the pizza hut big shots to comment and say call them or email them. Horrible. The end.

name: Kimberly Murchison
text:
Never never pay with your debit card they will tip themselves after being given cash!
Food was cold and burnt not the Pizza Hut quality I have become accustomed to through the years

name: stephanie sanders
text: Pizza Hut in Emporia Va has the worst pizza. I'd rather go miles further to get a pizzahut pizza. The cheese is always burnt to the crust and dry like its some dehydrated skin and the toppings burnt, and dry. The crust is not light and crunchy, as if they use premade dough from days before.

name: Maddie Lawson
text: Found HAIR in mine AND my boyfriends pizza. We will NEVER eat here again. WORST PIZZA EVER.

name: Joi Joyner
text: I ordered 3 pizzas and paid for delivery and never received them. I tried contacting them for three days and was places on hold the first day for 30 minutes just to be told to call when the manager is there. Called the second day and was placed on hold and never heard anything else.

name: Charles Simmons
text: Good pizza

name: 428sassycyndi
text: Not sure why people are complaining so much every time I order from here it's hot and they deliver fast!! Delivery driver was very nice and friendly and the pizza was delicious!!! I'll continue to order here . Don't let the haters get ya down your doing a great job ðŸ˜Š .. (Emporia resident)

name: Ariel Daniel
text: We go here often! Good service, great pizza! Download the app to make sure you get the latest discounts and coupons.

name: Marian Motley
text: First time in emporia service good waitress polite and friendly

name: Lauren Woodruff
text: Quick, easy, good service

name: Shawn Lucy
text: Pre ordered so wouldn't have to wait. When I picked up order they dropped in floor and all was said was it'll be 8 minutes to fix more.  I told her I pre ordered so I didn't have to wait. That I'll go to Domino's across street if I had to â€¦More

name: James Reed
text: It was take out only. No sit down.

name: Brian Mullis
text: Tashara and Jamie were awesome.   Clean store and tasty pizza's!

name: Champ Blackwell
text: Donâ€™t not waste your time are money I got a p-zone and three other pizzas. They all were super greasy and the p-zone was plain just a lot of bread this is the third time that pizza from here has hurt my stomach donâ€™t do it keep going

name: Michelle Clark
text: Friendly,  food was ready on time,  food was delicious.

name: WM M
text: Disgusting pizza is raw. Lazy. I was literally eating dough and felt nauseous.. pizza always sucks at this location.just get a frozen pizza. It's better than this garbage

name: Raven Falwell
text: Ordered 2 cheese pizzas online for delivery the pizzas were an hour late and cold after I had called to find out where the pizzas were and was reassured they would be hot,which they were not, I called to let the manager know I was otw to â€¦More

text: Good pizza reasonable delivery time.

name: Rebecca Sloan
text: Online site does not work

name: Iesha Whitaker
text: I ordered a veggie pizza and it was perfect!!! I've always love Pizza Hut!!!

name: Elva Wright
text: Good pizza. Good customer service.

name: Teresa Jones
text: Wings "naked" were expensive, wings come with 8 for a lil over $8, the pizza was ok, the pasta was extremely dry.

name: William Cross
text: Never again two hours in thrity mins to deliver !! Kids fell asleep bc I ordered at seven !!

name: Joshua Williams
text: What chain doesnt have a special? Called to find out what delivery specials they had.  After 3 minutes giving them all my info they needed to deliver I finally found out they have no deals except if I order online.  Why not stop interrupting and answer my queston upfront.

name: Brandi B
text: I really wish that there was an option to give this Pizza Hut a zero out of five. Never have I encountered such rude and incompetent individuals at a food establishment. The lazy women working the counter were acting as if we as customers â€¦More

text: Best vape shop in the country

text: The service was terrible. Please don't dine at this particular Pizza Hut. You will be disappointed.
